settings.title: Science
settings.description: Peel back the curtain to see how our paint protects you and your loved ones from indoor air pollution – round the clock.

settings.title: Indoor air pollution
settings.description:
We now spend more than 90% of our time indoors. When not at home, we’re huddled in offices, schools, malls – spaces prone to indoor pollutants.

VOCs, viruses, bacteria, mould, allergens & chemical particles affect our physical health, well-being & productivity.

settings.title: VOCs: the biggest culprit
settings.description:
Volatile Organic Compounds (VOCs) are gases released from products or chemical processes.

Many products release VOCs: cleaning liquids, aerosols, furniture, post-renovation odours, electronics – even our bodies.

settings.title: Benzene
settings.found_in: Found in glues, paints, furniture wax, detergents and cigarette smoke
settings.how_it_harm: Benzene stops the bone marrow from producing enough red blood cells, which can cause anemia. It damages ones’ immune system by reducing antibodies’ levels, causing a drop white blood cells.
settings.effects_of_exposure: Dry or watery eyes, headaches, cough, breathlessness, lethargy and respiratory ailments

settings.title: Formaldehyde
settings.found_in: Found in Building and decor materials, hair products, nail polish, cigarette smoke
settings.how_it_harm: Formaldehyde damages the liver, lungs, kidneys, central nervous systems and increases the risk of cancer. It aggravates respiratory conditions.
settings.effects_of_exposure: Dry or watery eyes, headaches, cough, breathlessness, lethargy

settings.title: Acetaldehyde
settings.found_in: Comes from plants, ripe fruits and vegetables, cigarette smoke, diesel, perfumes, flooring
settings.how_it_harm: The effects of acetaldehyde are similar to a hangover. Besides impairing brain, motor and memory functions, it also damages DNA and cell membranes, causing scar tissue.
settings.effects_of_exposure: Irritated eyes, skin and respiratory tract; lightheadness, skin rashes, coughing

settings.title: Toluene
settings.found_in: Found in metal cleaners, varnishes, shellac, nail polish, glues, rust preventives, printing inks
settings.how_it_harm: Toluene damages the heart, liver, kidney and lungs. It causes numbness in the hands or feet. It also affects babies’ development in the womb. Exposure can induce confusion and anxiety.
settings.effects_of_exposure: Irritated eyes, nose and throat; dry or cracked skin, headaches, dizziness, stupor

settings.title: Xylene
settings.found_in: Found in furniture refinishers, paint thinners, solvents, lacquers
settings.how_it_harm: Xylene slows the nervous system’s responsiveness and disrupts the functioning of nerve cells. It slows reaction time and reduces muscle coordination.
settings.effects_of_exposure: Irritated eyes, nose, skin and throat; headaches, slow reaction time, loss of muscle coordination

settings.title: Doesn’t use energy
settings.description: Unlike air purifiers, Gush paints remove pollutants without any electrical costs

settings.title: Air-purifying walls
settings.description: Gush paint transforms the largest surface area in your space into passive air purifiers

settings.title: Clean air, 24/7
settings.description: Our air-purifying features operate even without light, protecting your air day & night

settings.title: 02 The Solution
settings.description: We’ve teamed up with leading scientists and research partners to make a proven paint formulation that rids the air of pollutants.

settings.title: Gush Proprietary Catalyst (GPC)
settings.first_description: Our GPC’s catalytic agents have an activation energy of more than 120 kcal/mol. This cuts the organic chemical bonds in most VOCs.
settings.second_description: Our GPC breaks down 99% of VOCs and deodorizes your space of chemical fumes, within 21 hours.

settings.title: Gush Absorption Element (GAE)
settings.first_description: The GAE’s absorption capacity of 19.64 g/m² deprives mould spores and bacteria of water to sprout on the painted surface.
settings.second_description: The GAE’s hygroscopic nature draws pollutants to the wall, increasing the rate of contact so more pollutants are broken down in less time.

settings.title: 03 Testing
settings.description: We conducted various third-party tests to certify our product’s efficacy against VOCs, bacteria and mould growth as shown below:

settings.title: VOC removal
settings.short_description:

your space of chemical fumes, within 21 hours.
settings.tested_by: Test conducted by TUV SUD PSB

settings.title: Anti-bacterial
